trans-unit.source: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.
trans-unit.target: 代表可以包含其他可見元素的可捲動區域。

trans-unit.source: A ScrollViewer enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size.
trans-unit.target: ScrollViewer 可讓要比實際大小較小的區域中顯示內容。

trans-unit.source: When the content of the ScrollViewer is not entirely visible, the ScrollViewer displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 當內容的 ScrollViewer 不是完全可見時，ScrollViewer 會顯示捲軸，使用者可以使用移動內容區域是可見的。

trans-unit.source: The area that includes all of the content of the ScrollViewer is the extent.
trans-unit.target: 包含所有的 ScrollViewer 內容區域是範圍。

trans-unit.source: The visible area of the content is the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 內容的可見區域是在檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 實體捲動是捲動內容的預先決定的實體遞增，通常用於宣告像素為單位的值。

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯捲動用於捲動邏輯樹狀中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a ScrollViewer and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>ScrollViewer 和集合中的項目及其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: 實體捲動是預設的捲動行為，適用於大部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If your ScrollViewer contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 ScrollViewer 包含項目數量龐大，捲動的效能可能會受到影響。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and to update only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致在拖曳時仍維持靜態內容的檢視<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>並更新時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>釋放。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Because the scroll bars for a ScrollViewer element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a ScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: 由於 ScrollViewer 項目的捲軸所定義之項目的預設樣式，將不再會出現捲軸，如果您將自訂樣式套用至 ScrollViewer。

trans-unit.source: Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear.
trans-unit.target: 捲軸必須定義要顯示的自訂樣式中。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollViewer Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollViewer controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ScrollViewer 控制項以自訂適用於多個 ScrollViewer 控制項使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollViewer, see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於 ScrollViewer 的狀態，請參閱[ScrollViewer 樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollViewer control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在 ScrollViewer 控制項的預設範本，並使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 排列內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目應該用來排列本身和其子系之父系內的最終區域。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 排列內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"></xref> interface are allowed to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否項目，支援<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"></xref>介面允許捲動。

trans-unit.source: Content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units.
trans-unit.target: 中的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>可以捲動，即實體單位或邏輯單元。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Physical units are device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 實體的單位是裝置無關的像素。

trans-unit.source: Logical units are used for scrolling items within an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯單元用於捲動<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>內的項目

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is to use physical units to scroll its content.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>是要用來捲動內容的實體單位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: However, in cases where the CanContentScroll is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在案例 CanContentScroll 且設為`true`，內容可以捲動，使用邏輯單元。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, and other controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，和繼承自其他控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>使用可捲動的邏輯單元。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If CanContentScroll is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items, instead of physical units.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanContentScroll `true`，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>屬性是數字的項目，而不是實體的單位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its CanContentScroll property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動，包裝主機<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>並將其 CanContentScroll 屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: 實體捲動是預設的捲動行為，適用於大部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the content is scrolled when the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>是`true`，內容會捲動，當使用者放開<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, the ContentHorizontalOffset value does not change.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，ContentHorizontalOffset 值不會變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, ContentHorizontalOffset updates to the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者放開<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，ContentHorizontalOffset 更新為目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `false`, the content is scrolled when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>是`false`，內容會捲動，當使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> is always equal to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>會一律等於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the extent.

trans-unit.source: ExtentHeight is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: ExtentHeight 是只有一個輸出屬性;它可以有效地設定藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>的內容項目。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the ExtentHeight, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`，ExtentHeight 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>屬性是數字的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含捲動內容的水平位移的值。

trans-unit.source: A positive HorizontalOffset value corresponds to the content being offset to the left.
trans-unit.target: 正數 HorizontalOffset 值會對應至左側的位移的內容。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介於零和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>減號</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>

trans-unit.target: 傳回的值將說明與裝置無關的像素。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, HorizontalOffset continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 版時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>是`true`，HorizontalOffset 持續地變更為使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，但內容檢視不會變更直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>釋放。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and HorizontalOffset represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A>代表可見內容的位移和 HorizontalOffset 代表內容為基礎的位移<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯捲動用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: 這不同於實體捲動，其中定義實體的增量，以指定的方向捲動內容。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.

trans-unit.source: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 回應特定的鍵盤輸入，並叫用相關聯的捲動行為。

trans-unit.source: The following keyboard input is recognized: - The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left.
trans-unit.target: 下列的鍵盤輸入的可辨識:-向左箭號︰ 內容捲動至左的一行。

trans-unit.source: - The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right.
trans-unit.target: -向︰ 內容捲動一行右邊。

trans-unit.source: - The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line.
trans-unit.target: -向上鍵︰ 將內容向上捲動一行。

trans-unit.source: - The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line.
trans-unit.target: -向下鍵︰ 將內容向下捲動一行。

trans-unit.source: - PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page.
trans-unit.target: -PAGE UP︰ 捲動到目前的頁面頂端的內容。

trans-unit.source: - PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page.
trans-unit.target: -PAGE DOWN︰ 捲動至目前頁面底部的內容。

trans-unit.source: - HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page.
trans-unit.target: -主目錄︰ 捲動至第一頁頂端的內容。

trans-unit.source: - END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.
trans-unit.target: -結束︰ 捲動內容的最後一頁的底部。

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯捲動用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定速率<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>中會變慢[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]每平方毫秒在慣性中。

trans-unit.source: When a user scrolls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> by using touch, the user puts a finger on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者捲動<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>藉由使用觸控，使用者將手指放在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>將手指移短的距離，畫面上，然後以測量時手指移動。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The result of this is that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will continue to move after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: 這個結果是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>會持續移動之後使用者提開手指。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The PanningDeceleration property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: PanningDeceleration 屬性指定後使用者取消手指捲動會變慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: The rate <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per squared millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 速率<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>中會變慢[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]每平方毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the way <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的方式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>要碰觸操作的回應。

trans-unit.source: ThePanningMode property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scroll horizontally, vertically, or both.
trans-unit.target: ThePanningMode 屬性會指定是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>捲動水平、 垂直或兩者。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>會在使用者拖曳手指支援 Windows 觸控的觸控式裝置上的控制項上時所捲動。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: PanningMode can be either set directly on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> or used as an attached property.
trans-unit.target: PanningMode 可以直接在設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>或做為附加屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When a control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, use PanningMode as an attached property to specify the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>它<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請使用 PanningMode 為附加屬性來指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>行為</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, set PanningMode directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>外部的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請將直接在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> PanningMode</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>要碰觸操作的回應。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定捲動位移轉譯操作位移的比率。

trans-unit.source: When a user drags a finger across an object, it is considered a translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者拖曳手指跨物件時，它會被視為轉譯操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses that manipulation to scroll.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>捲動中使用該操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The PanningRatio property specifies how much the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scrolls for each unit of translation.
trans-unit.target: PanningRatio 屬性指定多少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>捲動每一單位的轉譯。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For example, if PanningRatio is 2, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for every [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] of the translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 PanningRatio 為 2，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>會捲動 2[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]的每個[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]翻譯操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: 捲動位移轉譯操作位移的比率。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the vertical size of the content element that can be scrolled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，代表可捲動內容項目的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, ScrollableHeight, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>，ScrollableHeight， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>屬性是數字的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯捲動用來捲動至邏輯樹狀結構中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: 這不同於實體捲動，其中定義實體的增量，以指定的方向捲動內容。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含捲動內容之垂直位移的值。

trans-unit.source: A positive VerticalOffset value corresponds to the content being offset to the top.
trans-unit.target: 正數 VerticalOffset 值會對應至內容上方的位移。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介於零和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>減號</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and VerticalOffset properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，而且 VerticalOffset 屬性都是數字的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, VerticalOffset continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 版時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>是`true`，VerticalOffset 持續地變更為使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，但內容檢視不會變更直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>釋放。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and VerticalOffset represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>代表可見內容的位移和 VerticalOffset 代表內容為基礎的位移<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，代表捲動內容的垂直位移。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否垂直<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>應該顯示。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> value that indicates whether a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref>值，指出是否垂直<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>應該顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含內容檢視區的垂直大小的值。

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the visible area of the content.
trans-unit.target: 檢視區是內容的可見區域。

trans-unit.source: ViewportHeight is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: ViewportHeight 是只有一個輸出屬性;它可以有效地設定藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>的內容項目。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, ViewportHeight, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>，ViewportHeight，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>屬性是數字的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，這些屬性的值會與裝置無關的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，代表內容檢視區的垂直大小。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the visible area of the content.
